description: dancing female figure in light blue outer robe with crane decoration; standing on PL foot with PL leg bent across body, foot raised; PR arm down, holding bells; PR hand held up with open fan behind body; figure is looking over PR shoulder to L; tall black hat

title: Sanbasō Dancer
